## Metrics

### Player Metrics

* Goals (G)

* Assists (A)

* Shots on Target (SoT): an intentional shot that goes into the net, or would have gone into the net if not for being stopped by the goalkeeper or the last defender

    * Does not count hitting the post or crossbar.
    
* Pass Completion Rate (PCR): $\frac{\text{Successful Passes}}{\text{Total Passes}}\times 100$
